data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Jharsuguda.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jharsuguda, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 6,375 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Jharsuguda, Odisha, India.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Jharsuguda, Odisha, India to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Lord, please remember the Rangrez (Hindu traditions) people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 579,500 people living in Jharsuguda.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Jharsuguda, Odisha, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary:
the county of Jharsuguda, Odisha, India has a population of 579,500.

We estimate Jharsuguda has 6,375 people who might know Jesus, 7,031 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 566,094 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 6,375 believers in Jharsuguda, Odisha, India to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.
